thread.section_title: MobileZap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MobileZap | mobilezap.com.au
thread.title: Rod McNeil

author: Rod McNeil
title: Rod McNeil
text:
Determined through internet research that that the Motorola G4+ plus would make an admirable upgrade to my 4 year old Sony. MobileZap seemed the best local company to fulfill my order as they offered the best price/delivery for my chosen product. From placement of order through to delivery they were excellent in that receipts, delivery communications & follow up were there in a timely manner. Had some initial setup problems for which I was ably assisted by MobileZap support staff. Overall a most satisfying purchase, probably one of the best online transactions I've ever experienced. Thanks MobileZap.
Regards
Rod McNeil
